/* Characters Data */ IRON MAN Inventor Tony Stark applies his genius for high-tech solutions to problems as Iron Man, the armored Avenger. CAPTAIN AMERICA Recipient of the Super Soldier serum, World War II hero Steve Rogers fights for American ideals as one of the worldâ€™s mightiest heroes and the leader of the Avengers. THOR The son of Odin uses his mighty abilities as the God of Thunder to protect his home Asgard and planet Earth alike.
